record.field: You do not have permission to remove this lot [%(lot)s] with the health alert on true.
You do not have permission to check to True the healt alert field on this lot [%(lots)s].
You do not have permission to edit this lot [%(lots)s] with the health alert on true.
You do not have permission to create a lot with the health alert on true.
You do not have permission to modify lots.
You are trying to do the Stock Move "%(move)s" but its Lot "%(lot)s" is in health alert and the Destination Location "%(to_location)s" doesn't accept lots in health alert.
You do not have permission to remove this move [product name: %(name)s] with the health alert lot on true.
You do not have permission to edit this move [product name: %(names)s] with the health alert lot on true.
You do not have permission to create a move [product name, %(name)s] with the health alert lot on true.
